game.name: Sahir: Shiv of Memories
game.categories: Single-player, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The loved ones we lost long ago returned to us on the island, in different bodies. Who can we trust now? A classic story-driven JRPG blended with survival mechanics. Gather your party, choose who you trust amidst the mysterious events unfolding on the island, and fight to survive.
